archimate:Requirement.name: SA-11(3): Developer Testing and Evaluation | Independent Verification of Assessment Plans and Evidence
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Require an independent agent satisfying [Assignment: organization-defined independence criteria] to verify the correct implementation of the developer security and privacy assessment plans and the evidence produced during testing and evaluation; and (b) Verify that the independent agent is provided with sufficient information to complete the verification process or granted the authority to obtain such information.

properties.value: Independent agents have the qualifications—including the expertise, skills, training, certifications, and experience—to verify the correct implementation of developer security and privacy assessment plans.
